body_html:
Hi,

That's definetely a bazel issue. The user building package had no valid home and thus $HOME was set to TF source tree.
For some reason that confuses bazel (worked with 0.5.2) so I forced $HOME to be set to /tmp/temp.randomstuff and it works now.

Closing as it's not TF related obviously.

body:
Hi,

That's definetely a bazel issue. The user building package had no valid home and thus $HOME was set to TF source tree.
For some reason that confuses bazel (worked with 0.5.2) so I forced $HOME to be set to /tmp/temp.randomstuff and it works now.

Closing as it's not TF related obviously.
